short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays communist music when certain words are clicked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whether you agree communism was right or not, we can all agree that communist music is the best. This extension helps you play communist music on the go wherever you are! Are you doing homework? Are you reading history trivia? Are you watching the Olympics? Well you could now listen to communist music when you're doing any of the above, and more! Simply find a communist word, and double click it to listen to the perfect musical compositions that are communist music.
